ad_text: The IOSCO Companies Sponsored Iosco is looking to hire an over-the-road truck driver to run our Portland - Texas lane. This position pays by the mile and Iosco's rate is $.70/mile (~$90-120,000.00+/per year). Not included in this figure is a $300/month safety bonus and $200 allowance for 34-hour resets taken while on the road. This is a company-driver position and you will receive a W2 at the end of each year. Iosco provides you with a dedicated truck, fuel card, and all truck & trailer maintenance is the responsibility of the company. Benefit-wise, Iosco offers Health Insurance after 60 days and 401k with Employer matching after six months and six paid holidays (regardless of if you are on the road or not). Iosco also offers $400/month that can be used to reduce the monthly premium. If it is not put toward the premium, the allowance is given to the driver each month. A Hazmat Endorsement is required before employment. A Valid Class A CDL with at least two years of verifiable driving experience is required. If interested, please submit an application, message us, or give us a call at 503-570-3301 and ask for Darin!
